channel.title: CVE Feed for Eclipse -- CycloneDDS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Eclipse -- CycloneDDS

item.title: CVE-2021-38443|2024-08-04T01:44:22.345Z -- eclipse -- cyclonedds
item.description: Eclipse CycloneDDS versions prior to 0.8.0 improperly handle invalid structures, which may allow an attacker to write arbitrary values in the XML parser.

item.title: CVE-2021-38441|2024-08-04T01:44:22.398Z -- eclipse -- cyclonedds
item.description: Eclipse CycloneDDS versions prior to 0.8.0 are vulnerable to a write-what-where condition, which may allow an attacker to write arbitrary values in the XML parser.
